item.title: An old repair is failing and has left a sharp edge hole that tires always hit, 13th May
item.description:
In between old pegglesworth house and the road to hilcot. it is in the eastbound lane and difficult not to hit with your tire
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
